flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=41>>41 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 41 * (2/3) = <<41*2/3=82/3>>82/3 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 41 - 82/3 = <<41-82/3=41/3>>41/3 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 41/3 + 10 + 3 = <<41/3+10+3=80/3>>80/3 pairs of socks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 41. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
